body:
Group A:
1. Team Allah
2. The Crazy Beaners
3. Apollo
4. Varsity

Group B:
1. China Baby Toes
2. La Vigen
3. Eternal Cross
4. Sagrevyum

I am guessing the bracket is as follows:
Round 1:
Team Allah vs. Sagrevyum (Allah Wins)
La Vigen Vs. Apollo (La Vigen Wins)
China Baby Toes Vs. Varsity (China Baby Toes Wins)
The Crazy Beaners vs. Eternal Cross (The Crazy Beaners Wins)

Losers Round 1:
Sagrevyum vs. Apollo (Apollo Wins)
Varsity vs. Eternal Cross (Eternal Cross Wins)

Round 2:
Team Allah vs. La Vigen (La Vigen Wins)
China Baby Toes vs. The Crazy Beaners (China Baby Toes Wins)

Losers Round 2:
Apollo vs. The Crazy Beaners (The Crazy Beaners Wins)
Eternal Cross vs. Team Allah (Team Allah Wins)

Semifinals:
La Vigen vs. China Baby Toes (La Vigen Wins)

Losers round 3:
The Crazy Beaners vs. Team Allah (Team Allah Wins)

Losers round 4:
Team Allah vs. China Baby Toes (China Baby Toes Wins)

Finals:
China Baby Toes vs. La Vigen (China Baby Toes Wins)

TL:DR 1st Place China Baby Toes, 2nd La Vigen, 3rd Team Allah.  What are your predictions?
